strengths: All three previous action items resolved: RadarChart typed, LanguageProvider removed, integration test added
/api/try/route.ts runs 6 agents in parallel via Promise.allSettled with minimum-3 threshold, fallback synthesis, SSE streaming
Validation pipeline rigorous: validate.ts (578 lines), audit-loader routes all reads through typed parse functions, CI has 5 quality gates, hooks auto-formatting
weaknesses: try-storage.ts casts raw JSON as TryPanelResult without validation (lines 67, 102)
Test count dropped from 73 to 68; route.ts (436 lines) and usePanelStream.ts have zero test coverage
rate-limit.ts uses in-memory Map that resets on serverless cold starts
critical_issues: Zero test coverage for route.ts (436 lines) and usePanelStream.ts
try-storage.ts bypasses validation pipeline with direct JSON casting

strengths: Try-It-Now is zero-friction conversion funnel: HeroTrySection on homepage, auto-start via useSearchParams
SSE streaming delivers progressive disclosure in real-time, trust builds incrementally
Two-tier BYOK model creates natural upgrade path (free=Haiku, BYOK=full panel)
weaknesses: Web review results stored on filesystem via try-storage.ts with /tmp fallback — ephemeral on serverless
File selection heuristic in github.ts only picks 3 source files, caps at 30KB — shallow for large projects
No README.md for dashboard/ — web experience underrepresented in root README
critical_issues: Ephemeral /tmp storage loses results on serverless cold starts
File selection heuristic too shallow (3 files, 30KB cap) for representative analysis

strengths: Try-It-Now web feature with 6 parallel agents, SSE streaming, tiered model routing
6-iteration self-improvement arc (68.4 → 90.02) is genuinely novel recursive self-improvement
Model routing documented, justified, extended to web with three tiers
weaknesses: All 3 iter-5 action items unimplemented (no A/B effort test, no cross-iteration context, no debate round)
Web panel API doesn't use extended thinking — no thinking parameter despite Opus capability
Agent coordination remains purely parallel with post-hoc synthesis, no inter-agent debate
critical_issues: Extended thinking capability not utilized in web API despite Opus 4.6 availability
No inter-agent debate mechanism for adversarial evaluation

strengths: All 3 previous action items resolved: AGENT_COLORS satisfies, RadarChart typed, LanguageProvider removed
SSE streaming architecture well-designed: typed UsePanelStreamReturn, AbortController cleanup, Promise.allSettled
Zero any types, strict mode, 68 passing tests, proper Server/Client Component boundaries
weaknesses: New animated components (PanelAgentCard, PanelSynthesisView, StreamingAgentCard) don't call useReducedMotion()
Index-as-key used in dynamic content lists; AgentFormCard.tsx:158 has genuinely dynamic list with index keys
EFFORT_STYLES duplicated between PanelSynthesisView.tsx and results/web/[auditId]/page.tsx
critical_issues: Animated components missing useReducedMotion() check (accessibility regression)
Index keys in dynamic lists violate React best practices

strengths: Documentation production-grade: README, CONTRIBUTING, SECURITY.md added, CHANGELOG (390 lines total)
Accessibility fundamentals rock-solid: skip-to-content, focus-visible on nav/footer, ARIA progressbars, useReducedMotion
Community-ready: MIT, CODE_OF_CONDUCT, issue templates, SECURITY policy, 5-gate CI, 68 tests
weaknesses: Try-It-Now components lack focus-visible styling (TryPageClient buttons, HeroTrySection, PanelAgentCard)
Two-panel screenshot not added to Quick Start
critical_issues: New Try-It-Now feature missing focus-visible keyboard navigation styling

strengths: Try-It-Now democratizes access — zero-install 6-agent review, rate limiting production-ready
Board Builder enables community contribution — custom panels, YAML export, template gallery
Production-grade integration: YAML configs, env vars, install.sh, 5-gate CI, auto-deploy
weaknesses: i18n infrastructure removed rather than expanded — no locale switching, hardcoded "en"
Inter font limited to latin + latin-ext — no cyrillic/greek/arabic/CJK
ARIA implementation basic — no keyboard nav testing, no focus management in modal-like states
critical_issues: i18n removal limits global accessibility despite community-focused features

top_strengths: All 6 agents resolved their previous action items (Boris: RadarChart typing, Lydia: LanguageProvider removal, Ado: SECURITY.md) — demonstrates strong iteration discipline [consensus: boris, lydia, ado]
Try-It-Now delivers zero-friction conversion funnel with SSE streaming, 6 parallel agents, rate limiting, and progressive disclosure [consensus: boris, cat, thariq, jason]
Production-grade foundations: 68 passing tests, strict TypeScript, 5-gate CI, auto-formatting hooks, comprehensive validation pipeline [consensus: boris, lydia, ado, jason]
Community-ready packaging: MIT license, CODE_OF_CONDUCT, SECURITY.md, CONTRIBUTING.md, issue templates, CHANGELOG [consensus: ado, jason]
6-iteration self-improvement arc (68.4 → 90.80) demonstrates recursive self-improvement capability unique to this project [consensus: thariq, boris]
top_weaknesses: Try-It-Now accessibility gaps: missing focus-visible styling on interactive elements (TryPageClient buttons, HeroTrySection, PanelAgentCard) and no useReducedMotion() checks in animated components [consensus: lydia, ado, jason]
Test coverage regression: count dropped from 73 to 68; critical route.ts (436 lines) and usePanelStream.ts have zero test coverage [consensus: boris, lydia]
Ephemeral storage architecture: try-storage.ts uses /tmp fallback, rate-limit.ts uses in-memory Map — both reset on serverless cold starts [consensus: boris, cat]
File selection heuristic too shallow: github.ts only picks 3 source files capped at 30KB total, insufficient for representative analysis [consensus: cat, thariq]
Extended thinking capability unused: Web panel API doesn't pass thinking parameter to Opus agents despite Opus 4.6 availability [consensus: thariq, boris]

agent_a.position: i18n removal is a critical regression (scored 72/100 for internationalization); removing locale switching and hardcoding 'en' limits global accessibility despite community-focused features

agent_b.position: LanguageProvider removal improved code quality (scored 91/100 for developer experience); it was over-engineered for a monolingual app, increasing complexity without delivering value

divergent_opinions.analysis: This is a classic simplicity-vs-future-proofing tension. Jason's position is stronger from a global community impact perspective — the project's mission (democratizing AI evaluation) directly benefits from multilingual support. However, Lydia correctly identifies that premature i18n infrastructure adds maintenance burden. The resolution should be incremental: restore basic i18n scaffolding (Accept-Language detection, translation file structure) but defer full translation until there's concrete demand. Jason's 72 score reflects real community limitation; Lydia's 91 reflects good immediate engineering judgment.

agent_a.position: All 3 iter-5 action items unimplemented (no A/B effort test, no cross-iteration context, no debate round); scored 80/100 for emergent behavior due to lack of inter-agent coordination advancement

agent_b.position: All three previous action items resolved; scored 93/100 for compound learning; validation pipeline rigorous and complete; strong iteration discipline

divergent_opinions.analysis: Both are correct but measuring different things. Boris tracks immediate action item resolution (RadarChart typing, LanguageProvider removal) — these were resolved. Thariq tracks strategic innovation items from his iter-5 recommendations (debate rounds, cross-iteration context) — these were deferred. This divergence reveals prioritization choice: the team focused on production readiness (Boris's domain) over advanced AI capabilities (Thariq's domain). Given proximity to launch, Boris's assessment is more relevant to current milestone. Thariq's concerns are valid for post-launch roadmap. No conflict — different evaluation timeframes.

action_items.action: Add focus-visible styling to all Try-It-Now interactive elements: TryPageClient buttons, HeroTrySection, PanelAgentCard navigation. Use existing focus-visible:ring-2 pattern from NavBar.
action_items.impact: Resolves accessibility regression affecting 15%+ of users who navigate via keyboard; improves WCAG 2.1 AA compliance

action_items.action: Add useReducedMotion() check to PanelAgentCard, PanelSynthesisView, StreamingAgentCard. Disable framer-motion animations when user prefers reduced motion.
action_items.impact: Prevents vestibular disorders for motion-sensitive users; closes critical accessibility gap

action_items.action: Add parseTryPanelResult validator in validate.ts; update try-storage.ts lines 67, 102 to use validator instead of direct JSON casting. Enforce same validation rigor as plugin audits.
action_items.impact: Closes validation bypass; prevents malformed data from reaching UI; maintains type safety guarantees

action_items.action: Add test coverage for /api/try/route.ts (436 lines) and usePanelStream.ts. Mock Anthropic SDK, verify SSE events, test fallback synthesis when <3 agents succeed.
action_items.impact: Recovers from test count regression (73→68); covers highest-risk code paths in Try-It-Now feature

action_items.action: Replace ephemeral /tmp storage with persistent store (Vercel KV). Add shareable URLs for Try-It-Now results (e.g., /results/web/share/[hash]) so users can reference or share their reviews.
action_items.impact: Enables persistence across serverless cold starts; unlocks viral sharing mechanism; improves conversion funnel

action_items.action: Replace in-memory rate limiter (rate-limit.ts) with durable store (Vercel KV with TTL). Use IP + sliding window algorithm to prevent rate limit reset on cold starts.
action_items.impact: Prevents abuse of Try-It-Now API; maintains consistent rate limiting across serverless deployments

action_items.action: Add extended thinking to Opus agent calls in /api/try/route.ts. Set thinking.type='enabled', thinking.budget_tokens calibrated by agent (Boris/Cat/Thariq: 10000-15000 tokens).
action_items.impact: Leverages Opus 4.6 extended thinking for deeper architectural and innovation analysis; improves evaluation quality

action_items.action: Expand file selection heuristic in github.ts: increase from 3 to 8-10 source files, raise cap from 30KB to 80KB. Add size/complexity weighting to prioritize core implementation files over config/tests.
action_items.impact: Provides more representative codebase sample; improves evaluation accuracy for medium-large projects

action_items.action: Extract EFFORT_STYLES to ui-constants.ts; create shared DivergentOpinions and PrioritizedActionItems components to eliminate duplication between PanelSynthesisView.tsx and results/web/[auditId]/page.tsx.
action_items.impact: Reduces code duplication; ensures consistent styling across plugin and web results; improves maintainability

action_items.action: Add 'Files Analyzed' expandable section in Try-It-Now results showing which files were selected and why (name, size, reason). Builds trust by making file selection heuristic transparent.
action_items.impact: Increases user trust in evaluation by showing what was analyzed; provides context for shallow reviews

resolved_items: RadarChart typing: Boris confirmed all previous action items resolved including RadarChart TypeScript typing
LanguageProvider removal: Lydia and Boris confirmed LanguageProvider removed, simplifying codebase
Integration test added: Boris verified integration test coverage added per iter-5 recommendations
SECURITY.md added: Ado confirmed SECURITY policy and documentation in place
new_items: Try-It-Now accessibility gaps: Missing focus-visible styling and useReducedMotion() checks in new feature components
Test coverage regression: Count dropped from 73 to 68; route.ts (436 lines) and usePanelStream.ts lack coverage
Ephemeral storage architecture: try-storage.ts and rate-limit.ts use /tmp and in-memory Map, resetting on cold starts
Validation bypass: try-storage.ts casts raw JSON without using validation pipeline (lines 67, 102)
Extended thinking unused: Web API doesn't leverage Opus 4.6 thinking capability despite availability
Code duplication: EFFORT_STYLES and components duplicated between PanelSynthesisView and web results page
